rating_comment: This place it’s located in very good location. 24 hours security. Host communication is reasonably pleasant. Amenities like restaurants, transport, hospitals are in close proximity.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · January 2024,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment:
Everything was clean and organized, finding the apartment was easy and Kysar was super responsive. He had resolved one unexpected issue during our stay very professionally in a very short time! The beds are quite comfortable. Lighting is great all around. Even this is in an old building, but this place is kept very well and clean. To our surprise this 3 BD apt is quite a big one! The entire place is cozy, comfortable, clean, and well stocked. The location cannot be beat. All the restaurants and the super stores are nearby just a few mins of walking. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and felt like a home in this place.
Kysar was very quick in responding to my queries. Thank you for everything! We will definitely be staying again in your place one day 😊. Kysar is truly a super host.

Wonderful location to save traffic time for convenient store, kitchen utensils added extra value to user in terms of quality and selection of items, host was willing to listen any inconvenience . From my knowledge host has not multiple properties to manage and make easy to solve any problem without delegating issues to his manager

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · March 2023,  · Stayed with kids
rating_comment: Mr. Kaiser this gentleman was a great host! He kept the lines of communication open. Whenever I texted him with questions he returned my text quickly. Check-in was smooth and hassle-free. His assistant was so sweet, kind, and professional. Mr. Kaiser was there to escort me into my Airbnb and wait for us to arrive promptly and it was very accommodating when I needed to check out early evening. Mr. Kaiser's apartment was beautiful, and comfortable, and looked exactly like the pictures posted. His building was in a nice prime location and very easy to travel everywhere. 24/7 security by the gate. We had a great stay in Kaiser place. I would recommend his Airbnb and if I travel to Bangladesh, I will plan to make future reservations to stay in his again. Loved it this K's place. It was very easy to find the address.
In one sentence, Mr. Kysar and his wife are excellent people. I personally recommend Mr. Kysar as a super host.

Kysar’s place is on a very prime location and going to other parts of city was easier. There are supermarkets at a walking distance.
The place, though a bit old, is very well appointed with keen attention to details for all required things for a nice and comfortable stay. The apartment is huge with large areas which kids liked a lot. Kysar was an excellent host and promptly responded to our needs. We would like stay at his place in future and recommend to anyone looking for a nice stay at a connected location in Dhaka. Thanks
Had rented it to host my friend visiting from Greece! A nice home in a great location! Kysar is a super guest!!

Thank you for the excellent service you provided.
We will come back again when we are in Dhaka next time.

I spent more than a week here and had a fun and happy time. The host took care of our needs delicately and was very kind. It is located in a very good location, so it is good to use nearby marts and restaurants. I cooked here, and I was able to use warm water was enough. Our team is all satisfied with this accommodation and would like to make a reservation here again if we visit Bangladesh again. The host was very kind. Thank you.

Upon entering the house, you'd get a warm welcome. Mr. Kyser is an excellent host, whenever we asked for something, he promptly resolved everything. The house is in a prime location, very neat and clean. Me and my family loved staying there, and we'd of course rent this flat next time !
